tool_description: Validates audio file format, codec, and basic properties to ensure compatibility with transcription pipeline.

audio_file_path.description: Path to the audio file to validate

error_messages: File not found: The specified audio file path does not exist. Verify the file path is correct.

usage: Provide the path to an audio file to validate its format and basic properties before processing.

is_valid.description: Whether the audio file is valid and supported

duration_seconds.description: Duration of the audio file in seconds
